name: Portfolio Website
desc: Personal Portfolio Website showcasing my skills, projects, and experience. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern web technologies.

name: GUI Movie Ticket Booking System
desc: A fully functional Python-based movie ticket booking system with seat selection, QR code payments, and MySQL database integration.

name: GUI YouTube Downloader
desc: A simple yet powerful Python-based GUI application to download YouTube videos and audio directly to your device. Built with Python, customtkinter, and pytube.

name: Todo List
desc: A dynamic todo list application with add, delete, and mark as complete functionality. Built purely with python

name: Password Generator
desc: A secure password generator that creates strong passwords with customizable options. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Stopwatch
desc: A simple terminal-based stopwatch application with start, stop, and reset functionality. Built with Python and tkinter, featuring a clean GUI.

name: P2P Version 2
desc: A peer-to-peer file sharing application built with TypeScript, enabling direct file transfers between users over the web.
